gui.overlord.squad_manager.name: Squad Manager
gui.overlord.create_squad.name: Create Squad
gui.overlord.create_squad.missing_squad: The requested squad was not found. Please close and re-open the squad manager.
gui.overlord.create_squad.pattern_taken: This pattern+item combination is already in use by another squad.
gui.overlord.create_squad.locked_pattern: You have not unlocked this pattern yet. Please see its tooltip for the unlock requirements.
gui.overlord.create_squad.name_required: Squad Name must not be blank.
gui.overlord.create_squad.locked_item: Unable to verify that you can use the selected item. Please use a different item or close and re-open the squad manager.
gui.overlord.local_orders.name: Issue Local Orders
gui.overlord.local_orders.currently_orde: Currently ordering members of squad %s within %s blocks.
Currently ordering any nearby army member within %s blocks.
gui.overlord.aisettings.name: Orders
gui.overlord.aisettings.option.combat.on: Only fight after the player is attacked.
gui.overlord.aisettings.option.combat.pu: Skeleton will go after targets if necessary to fight them, regardless of movement settings.
gui.overlord.aisettings.option.combat.sw: Switch to Melee when out of ammo
Switch to Melee when close to the enemy
Distance from the enemy to switch to melee
Switch to Ranged when far from the enemy
Distance from the enemy to switch to ranged
Return to Home Position after wandering away (generally for combat) when stationed.
The point a skeleton will return to when stationed, or wander in a radius around when wandering.
Wander away without staying near Home Position.
How far from Home Position this can wander.
